thread.title: BRIEF-Vertex Pharma Says Established Wholesale Acquisition Cost Of $292,000 For SYMDEKO In U.S. On Annual Basis

title: BRIEF-Vertex Pharma Says Established Wholesale Acquisition Cost Of $292,000 For SYMDEKO In U.S. On Annual Basis

organizations.name: brief-vertex pharma says established wholesale acquisition cost
symdeko in u.s. on annual basis reuters staff

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* VERTEX PHARMA - HAVE ESTABLISHED WHOLESALE ACQUISITION COST FOR SYMDEKO IN UNITED STATES OF $292,000 ON ANNUAL BASIS ($22,400 PER 28-DAY PACK)
* VERTEX PHARMA SAYS ANTICIPATE FY 2018 TOTAL CF NET PRODUCT REVENUE OF $2.65 BILLION TO $2.80 BILLION FROM KALYDECO, ORKAMBI AND SYMDEKO - SEC FILING
* VERTEX PHARMACEUTICALS -REITERATING ‍COMBINED GAAP RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT, SALES, GENERAL, ADMINISTRATIVE EXPENSES IN 2018 TO BE IN RANGE OF $1.80 TO $1.95 BILLION
* VERTEX PHARMA- ‍ REITERATING COMBINED NON-GAAP RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT AND SALES, GENERAL, AND ADMINISTRATIVE EXPENSES WILL BE IN RANGE OF $1.50 BILLION TO $1.55 BILLION IN 2018​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2BTkdmr ) Further company coverage:
